titleStmt.title: The reply of the hamlet of Wapping to the answer of the rector to their Case and petition and likewise to The case of the church-wardens of White-chappel.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: creased and torn, with loss of print.
The rector's answer was entitled: The rector of Whitechappel's answer to the case and petition of the hamlet of Wapping.
Wapping wished to become a distinct parish.
Reproduction of original in the Guildhall (London, England).
